Package org.gamelink.tournament

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Match
    The Match class represents an individual match in the tournament, each class contains important information including, the teams involved, as well as the scores and outcome of the match
    Scheduler
    The Scheduler class is used to create a tournament structure for all matches to be played it ensures that every team plays every other team twice; once as player 1 and once as player 2
    Team
    The Team Class is used to represent a team in the tournament, it stores all stats associated with that teams position in that particular tournament, including wins, losses, ties, total score,
